params.ipId: The ID of the IP asset

returns._0: royaltyStack Sum of the royalty percentages to be paid to ancestors for a given royalty policy

params.ipId: The ipId of the IP asset

returns._0: The amount of royalty tokens required to link a child to a given IP asset
True if the royalty policy support working with group otherwise false

onLicenseMinting(address,uint32,bytes).details: Enforced to be only callable by RoyaltyModule

params.externalData: The external data custom to each the royalty policy
params.ipId: The ipId whose license is being minted (licensor)
params.licensePercent: The license percentage of the license being minted

onLinkToParents(address,address[],addres.details: Enforced to be only callable by RoyaltyModule

params.externalData: The external data custom to each the royalty policy
params.ipId: The children ipId that is being linked to parents
params.licenseRoyaltyPolicies: The royalty policies of the license
params.licensesPercent: The license percentages of the licenses being minted
params.parentIpIds: The parent ipIds that the children ipId is being linked to

returns._0: The royalty stack of the child ipId for a given royalty policy

getPolicyRoyaltyStack(address).notice: Returns the royalty stack for a given IP asset

getPolicyRtsRequiredToLink(address,uint3.notice: Returns the amount of royalty tokens required to link a child to a given IP asset

isSupportGroup().notice: Returns the royalty policy support working with group

onLicenseMinting(address,uint32,bytes).notice: Executes royalty related logic on minting a license

onLinkToParents(address,address[],addres.notice: Executes royalty related logic on linking to parents
